PlayerBasicAttack.Name: PlayerBasicAttack
PlayerBasicAttack.Narrative: strikes the enemy with his sword.

GoblinSlash.Name: GoblinSlash
GoblinSlash.Narrative: slashes the player with a rusty blade.

UndeadGrasp.Name: UndeadGrasp
UndeadGrasp.Narrative: seizes the player with a cold hand.

TrollSmash.Name: TrollSmash
TrollSmash.Narrative: smashes the ground, stunning everyone around.
